snippet: Bill Belichick and Tom Brady are the immovable objects of the N.F.L. playoffs, together capturing 3 Super Bowl titles, 5 conference championships and 10 division titles.
abstract: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick and quarterback Tom Brady are immovable objects of the NFL playoffs, together capturing 3 Super Bowl titles, 5 conference championships and 10 division titles; Brady, with victory in upcoming divisional-round game against Houston Texans, would surpass Hall of Fame quarterback Joe Montana for most postseason wins.
lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick and Tom Brady are the immovable objects of the N.F.L. playoffs, together capturing 3 Super Bowl titles, 5 conference championships and 10 division titles.

headline.seo: A.F.C. — For Tom Brady and Bill Belichick, Few Words and Many Wins
headline.main: For Patriots’ Coach and Quarterback, Wins, Not Words, Add Up
headline.print_headline: For Patriots’ Coach and Quarterback, Wins, Not Words, Add Up
